description: The capability of an organisation to continue the delivery of products or services at pre-defined acceptable levels following a disruptive incident
name: Business Continuity

description: The impact on the reputation of the organisation as viewed by its clients
name: Reputation

description: The maintenance of, and the assurance of, data accuracy and consistency over its entire life-cycle
name: Data Integrity

description: The impact on the physical infrastucture
name: Infrastructure

description: Potential impact on the safety of the patients
name: Individual Safety
